articleData: CREATE TABLE articleData   (boardName character varying(20),articleCode character varying(30) PRIMARY KEY,articleUrl character varying(100),title character varying(100),authorId character varying(30),article character varying(1000),nrec integer DEFAULT 0,postDate timestamp with time zone,postVersion integer DEFAULT 0);
pushData: CREATE TABLE pushData(articleCode character varying(30),pushNo integer DEFAULT 0,pushId character varying(30),pushText character varying(50),pushTag character varying(2));
